name: Fallen Legend - Jam build
description:
Had to cut the game short in the end, but i really wanted to finish it on time for the "Finish your game" jam. At least two dungeons are missing, but if I ever make another RPG, these ideas might go into the new game. Was originally started for the OGA  Summer jam. Wasn´t able to playtest the whole thing.. So bugs, even game breaking ones, might be there.. 

Download is back up and should work now. Still no time for a whole playtest, though.

But at least, now there´s a short credits scene at the end of the game.

Short RPG in a Dragon Quest Style.
